channel.title: Posts on DrGos
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on DrGos

item.title: Hello World
item.description: How to create blog for free with Hugo and Github I’ve decided to start a blog and what better hello world post than how I’ve set it up. But first lets talk about what is Hugo. What is Hugo? 2560px-Logo_of_Hugo_the_static_website_generator.png According to their site Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again. Put it in layman terms Hugo is a tool that generates a full static HTML website based on raw data and a set of templates.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
